about_the_game:
Outline

High-performance voice changer now available at a low price!
Using up the new technology of the past year, we have been able to provide a voice changer of the highest standard at a low price.
We have created this character to be a little cool and kind little sister character.

It is available for commercial use without credits subject to the EULA on the right and can be used for various purposes such as video production, VTuber activities, singing voice conversion, game mod production, etc.
We have a firm contract with the voice actors, so you can use it without worrying about legal issues.

Feature Introduction

  • Only phoneme information is extracted from the voice and used, so the voice may be converted naturally regardless of voice characteristics or language.
  • Multiple mechanisms weaken the masculine components in the voice that might have been difficult to eliminate by conventional voice changers.
  • Of course, it can be used in real time!
  • Cute voices can be produced.
Note: There may be individual differences.

Character Profile

  • Name: Shinon
  • Favorite food: Big-bellied watermelon
  • Person of interest: Onii-chan

Note: This product is equivalent to the product "こえふぃーばー" sold in Japan.
CV: 千憂

name: VoiceMelody - Kawaii Voice Changer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i5-8400 or AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 8192 MB RAM
  • Graphics: CUDA 11.8 Supported GPUs (NVIDIA ONLY) with 6GB or more VRAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4096 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: High-performance voice changer at a low price! We have been able to offer a voice changer available for commercial use and can be used for various purposes such as video production, VTuber activities, singing voice conversion, game mod production, etc, at a low price.
supported_languages:
English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Ukrainian, Dutch, Greek, Swedish, Spanish - Latin America, Thai, Czech, Danish, Turkish, Norwegian, Hungarian, Finnish, Bulgarian, Vietnamese, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Polish, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*, Korean
*languages with full audio support
